title: Does Xbox Owe You an Apology? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.08.20
description:
Greg and Blessing talk about the backlash to Inside Xbox's "gameplay," the fact that the next Horizon will look good (lol), and more! 

Time  Stamps -
00:06:00 - Housekeeping
Thank you for going to the Core stream, PLEASE go to kindafunny.com/gamejam! Win prizes, earn us Extra Life money!
Predator: Hunting Grounds stream today at 3 p.m. PT. twitch.tv/kindafunnygames. If you missed Al’s video, it’s on ytkfg tomorrow.
I’m in the finals of the American Cancer Society Gamers v Cancer tournament. The Millers for Mizzou Borderlands 3 Party is Saturday night at 8 pm pt on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Black Jack, Al Tribesman
The Roper Report   -
00:10:40 - Xbox Event Responses
00:26:10 - will all the changes be behind the surface like more detailed AI, more expansive worlds, no loading screens, etc.?  - Best Friends Q:BJ Bernardo
00:21:50 -  - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:29:45 - We now have Nintendo Online Number, Kevin @ GameSpot
00:33:48 - Horizon Zero Dawn 2 Will Feature “Industry Benchmark Graphics”, Jake Bishop @ Respawn First
00:35:00 - The Detroit Lions Announced their Schedule… in Animal Crossing
00:38:35 - LESS THAN SHOCKING ROUND-UP
00:44:02 - Out today
00:47:00 -  MANSCAPED
 Reader mail   -
00:51:10 - Do you think Sony will come out swinging and do a full reveal of the PlayStation 5 alongside possible first party announcements such as Horizon and SpiderMan 2 and obviously most anticipated of all Knack 3? - Alex Brown
00:54:30 - Squad Up: Alec Bobko(Stadia) - Albob875
00:55:10 - You‘re Wrong
Next week’s Hosts:
MONDAY: Blessing and Tim
TUESDAY: Blessing and Imran
WEDNESDAY: Greg and Gary
THURSDAY: Blessing and Tim
FRIDAY: Blessing and Greg
